intro: Pilea diandra, commonly known as the Shiny Pilea, is a species of flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Araceae and is characterized by its glossy, heart-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically greenish-white in color. It is a popular indoor plant due to its ease of care and attractive foliage. Pilea diandra thrives in bright, indirect light and prefers well-draining soil.
